summary: The Coast Guard and Navy are preparing to build three heavy polar icebreakers to conduct missions in the Antarctic and Arctic. The single active heavy polar icebreaker is reaching the end of its useful service life. This interim report provides an update on the shipbuilding effort. title: Coast Guard Acquisitions: Status of Coast Guard's Heavy Polar Icebreaker Acquisition
